event.title: consists of the following six districts: Alula District Bandarbayla District Bosaso District Iskushuban District Qandala District Qardho District In 1998

data.event: In the official administrative divisions of Somalia, the Bari region consists of the following six districts: Alula District Bandarbayla District Bosaso District Iskushuban District Qandala District Qardho District In 1998, Bari became a part of Puntland, an autonomous region in northeastern Somalia.
In the Transitional Constitution of the Puntland Regional Government of 2001, Puntland's territory is defined in terms of Somalia's official regions, Bari being one of them.
